name: Board Meeting
description: Quarterly board meeting covering financial review and strategic planning.

description: Presenting digital transformation services to potential client.

description: Daily team sync covering achievements, priorities, and blockers.

description: Comprehensive onboarding program for new team members.

description: Intensive design thinking workshop for the new mobile app.

name: Client Call
description: Strategic planning call with key client about project roadmap.

description: Technical interview for senior developer position.

description: Quarterly executive review of company performance and goals.

name: Product Demo Recording
description: Recording product demonstration videos for marketing campaign.

description: Hands-on workshop on new development tools and frameworks.

description: Focused code review session for the authentication module.

name: Security Training
